Now after<S>310</S> these things<S>1697</S>, in the reign<S>4438</S> of Artaxerxes<S>783</S> king<S>4428</S> of Persia<S>6539</S>, Ezra<S>5830</S> the son<S>1121</S> of Seraiah<S>8304</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Azariah<S>5838</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Hilkiah<S>2518</S>,
The son<S>1121</S> of Shallum<S>7967</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Zadok<S>6659</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Ahitub<S>285</S>,
The son<S>1121</S> of Amariah<S>568</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Azariah<S>5838</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Meraioth<S>4812</S>,
The son<S>1121</S> of Zerahiah<S>2228</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Uzzi<S>5813</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Bukki<S>1231</S>,
The son<S>1121</S> of Abishua<S>50</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Phinehas<S>6372</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Eleazar<S>499</S>, the son<S>1121</S> of Aaron<S>175</S> the chief<S>7218</S> priest<S>3548</S>:
This Ezra<S>5830</S> went up<S>5927</S> from Babylon<S>894</S>; and he was a ready<S>4106</S> scribe<S>5608</S> in the law<S>8451</S> of Moses<S>4872</S>, which the LORD<S>3068</S> God<S>430</S> of Israel<S>3478</S> had given<S>5414</S>: and the king<S>4428</S> granted<S>5414</S> him all his request<S>1246</S>, according to the hand<S>3027</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> his God<S>430</S> upon him.
And there went up<S>5927</S> some of the children<S>1121</S> of Israel<S>3478</S>, and of the priests<S>3548</S>, and the Levites<S>3881</S>, and the singers<S>7891</S>, and the porters<S>7778</S>, and the Nethinims<S>5411</S>, unto Jerusalem<S>3389</S>, in the seventh<S>7651</S> year<S>8141</S> of Artaxerxes<S>783</S> the king<S>4428</S>.
And he came<S>935</S> to Jerusalem<S>3389</S> in the fifth<S>2549</S> month<S>2320</S>, which was in the seventh<S>7637</S> year<S>8141</S> of the king<S>4428</S>.
For upon the first<S>259</S> day of the first<S>7223</S> month<S>2320</S> began<S>3246</S> he to go up<S>4609</S> from Babylon<S>894</S>, and on the first<S>259</S> day of the fifth<S>2549</S> month<S>2320</S> came<S>935</S> he to Jerusalem<S>3389</S>, according to the good<S>2896</S> hand<S>3027</S> of his God<S>430</S> upon him. <sup>began: Heb. was the foundation of the going up</sup>
For Ezra<S>5830</S> had prepared<S>3559</S> his heart<S>3824</S> to seek<S>1875</S> the law<S>8451</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>, and to do<S>6213</S> it, and to teach<S>3925</S> in Israel<S>3478</S> statutes<S>2706</S> and judgments<S>4941</S>.
Now this is the copy<S>6572</S> of the letter<S>5406</S> that the king<S>4428</S> Artaxerxes<S>783</S> gave<S>5414</S> unto Ezra<S>5830</S> the priest<S>3548</S>, the scribe<S>5608</S>, even a scribe<S>5608</S> of the words<S>1697</S> of the commandments<S>4687</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S>, and of his statutes<S>2706</S> to Israel<S>3478</S>.
Artaxerxes<S>783</S>, king<S>4430</S> of kings<S>4430</S>, unto Ezra<S>5831</S> the priest<S>3549</S>, a scribe<S>5613</S> of the law<S>1882</S> of the God<S>426</S> of heaven<S>8065</S>, perfect<S>1585</S> peace, and at such a time<S>3706</S>. <sup>unto: or, to Ezra the priest, a perfect scribe of the law of the God of heaven, peace, etc</sup>
I<S>4481</S> make<S>7761</S> a decree<S>2942</S>, that all<S>3606</S> they of<S>4481</S> the people<S>5972</S> of Israel<S>3479</S>, and of his priests<S>3549</S> and Levites<S>3879</S>, in my realm<S>4437</S>, which are minded of their own freewill<S>5069</S> to go up<S>1946</S> to Jerusalem<S>3390</S>, go<S>1946</S> with thee<S>5974</S>.
Forasmuch<S>1768</S> <S>6903</S> as<S>3606</S> thou art sent<S>7972</S> of<S>4481</S> <S>6925</S> the king<S>4430</S>, and of his seven<S>7655</S> counsellors<S>3272</S>, to enquire<S>1240</S> concerning<S>5922</S> Judah<S>3061</S> and Jerusalem<S>3390</S>, according to the law<S>1882</S> of thy God<S>426</S> which is in thine hand<S>3028</S>; <sup>of the king: Chaldee, from before the king</sup>
And to carry<S>2987</S> the silver<S>3702</S> and gold<S>1722</S>, which the king<S>4430</S> and his counsellors<S>3272</S> have freely offered<S>5069</S> unto the God<S>426</S> of Israel<S>3479</S>, whose<S>1768</S> habitation<S>4907</S> is in Jerusalem<S>3390</S>,
And all<S>3606</S> the silver<S>3702</S> and gold<S>1722</S> that thou canst find<S>7912</S> in all<S>3606</S> the province<S>4083</S> of Babylon<S>895</S>, with<S>5974</S> the freewill offering<S>5069</S> of the people<S>5972</S>, and of the priests<S>3549</S>, offering willingly<S>5069</S> for the house<S>1005</S> of their God<S>426</S> which is in Jerusalem<S>3390</S>:
That<S>3606</S> <S>6903</S> thou mayest buy<S>7066</S> speedily<S>629</S> with this<S>1836</S> money<S>3702</S> bullocks<S>8450</S>, rams<S>1798</S>, lambs<S>563</S>, with their meat offerings<S>4504</S> and their drink offerings<S>5261</S>, and offer<S>7127</S> them<S>1994</S> upon<S>5922</S> the altar<S>4056</S> of the house<S>1005</S> of your God<S>426</S> which is in Jerusalem<S>3390</S>.
And whatsoever<S>4101</S> <S>1768</S> shall seem good<S>3191</S> to thee, and to<S>5922</S> thy brethren<S>252</S>, to do<S>5648</S> with the rest<S>7606</S> of the silver<S>3702</S> and the gold<S>1722</S>, that do<S>5648</S> after the will<S>7470</S> of your God<S>426</S>.
The vessels<S>3984</S> also that are given<S>3052</S> thee for the service<S>6402</S> of the house<S>1005</S> of thy God<S>426</S>, those deliver<S>8000</S> thou before<S>6925</S> the God<S>426</S> of Jerusalem<S>3390</S>.
And whatsoever more<S>7606</S> shall be needful<S>2819</S> for the house<S>1005</S> of thy God<S>426</S>, which thou shalt have occasion<S>5308</S> to bestow<S>5415</S>, bestow<S>5415</S> it out of<S>4481</S> the king's<S>4430</S> treasure<S>1596</S> house<S>1005</S>.
And I<S>4481</S>, even I<S>576</S> Artaxerxes<S>783</S> the king<S>4430</S>, do make<S>7761</S> a decree<S>2942</S> to all<S>3606</S> the treasurers<S>1490</S> which are beyond<S>5675</S> the river<S>5103</S>, that whatsoever Ezra<S>5831</S> the priest<S>3549</S>, the scribe<S>5613</S> of the law<S>1882</S> of the God<S>426</S> of heaven<S>8065</S>, shall require<S>7593</S> of you, it be done<S>5648</S> speedily<S>629</S>,
Unto<S>5705</S> an hundred<S>3969</S> talents<S>3604</S> of silver<S>3702</S>, and to an hundred<S>3969</S> measures<S>3734</S> of wheat<S>2591</S>, and to an hundred<S>3969</S> baths<S>1325</S> of wine<S>2562</S>, and to an hundred<S>3969</S> baths<S>1325</S> of oil<S>4887</S>, and salt<S>4416</S> without<S>3809</S> prescribing<S>3792</S> how much. <sup>measures: Chaldee, cors</sup>
Whatsoever<S>3606</S> is commanded by<S>2941</S> <S>4481</S> the God<S>426</S> of heaven<S>8065</S>, let it be diligently<S>149</S> done<S>5648</S> for the house<S>1005</S> of the God<S>426</S> of heaven<S>8065</S>: for<S>1768</S> why<S>4101</S> should there be<S>1934</S> wrath<S>7109</S> against<S>5922</S> the realm<S>4437</S> of the king<S>4430</S> and his sons<S>1123</S>? <sup>Whatsoever: Chaldee, Whatsoever is of the decree</sup>
Also we certify<S>3046</S> you, that touching any<S>3606</S> of the priests<S>3549</S> and Levites<S>3879</S>, singers<S>2171</S>, porters<S>8652</S>, Nethinims<S>5412</S>, or ministers<S>6399</S> of this<S>1836</S> house<S>1005</S> of God<S>426</S>, it shall not<S>3809</S> be lawful<S>7990</S> to impose<S>7412</S> toll<S>4061</S>, tribute<S>1093</S>, or custom<S>1983</S>, upon<S>5922</S> them.
And thou<S>607</S>, Ezra<S>5831</S>, after the wisdom<S>2452</S> of thy God<S>426</S>, that is in thine hand<S>3028</S>, set<S>4483</S> magistrates<S>8200</S> and judges<S>1782</S>, which may judge<S>1934</S> <S>1778</S> all<S>3606</S> the people<S>5972</S> that are beyond<S>5675</S> the river<S>5103</S>, all<S>3606</S> such as know<S>3046</S> the laws<S>1882</S> of thy God<S>426</S>; and teach<S>3046</S> ye them that know<S>3046</S> them not<S>3809</S>.
And whosoever<S>3606</S> will not<S>3809</S> do<S>1934</S> <S>5648</S> the law<S>1882</S> of thy God<S>426</S>, and the law<S>1882</S> of the king<S>4430</S>, let judgment<S>1780</S> be<S>1934</S> executed<S>5648</S> speedily<S>629</S> upon him<S>4481</S>, whether<S>2006</S> it be unto death<S>4193</S>, or<S>2006</S> to banishment<S>8332</S>, or<S>2006</S> to confiscation<S>6065</S> of goods<S>5232</S>, or to imprisonment<S>613</S>. <sup>to banishment: Chaldee, to rooting out</sup>
Blessed<S>1288</S> be the LORD<S>3068</S> God<S>430</S> of our fathers<S>1</S>, which hath put<S>5414</S> such a thing as this in the king's<S>4428</S> heart<S>3820</S>, to beautify<S>6286</S> the house<S>1004</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> which is in Jerusalem<S>3389</S>:
And hath extended<S>5186</S> mercy<S>2617</S> unto me before<S>6440</S> the king<S>4428</S>, and his counsellors<S>3289</S>, and before all the king's<S>4428</S> mighty<S>1368</S> princes<S>8269</S>. And I was strengthened<S>2388</S> as the hand<S>3027</S> of the LORD<S>3068</S> my God<S>430</S> was upon me, and I gathered together<S>6908</S> out of Israel<S>3478</S> chief men<S>7218</S> to go up<S>5927</S> with me.
